skills: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, Religion

class_features.description: Choose a patron that grants you magical powers. Additional features are granted at 6th, 10th, and 14th levels.
Warlocks have a unique spellcasting ability. They have limited spell slots that are regained on a short rest.
Learn Eldritch Invocations, which are special abilities that provide various benefits.
Choose a Pact Boon that grants you a magical gift from your patron.
Gain a warlock spell that you can cast once without using a spell slot. Additional Arcanum are gained at higher levels.
Regain all expended Pact Magic spell slots after entreating your patron for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

eldritch_invocations.name: Agonizing Blast
eldritch_invocations.description: When you cast Eldritch Blast, add your Charisma modifier to the damage it deals on a hit.

eldritch_invocations.name: Armor of Shadows
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Mage Armor on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

eldritch_invocations.name: Beast Speech
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Speak with Animals at will, without expending a spell slot.

eldritch_invocations.name: Beguiling Influence
eldritch_invocations.description: You gain proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion skills.

eldritch_invocations.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
eldritch_invocations.description: You can now inscribe magical rituals in your Book of Shadows. You can choose two 1st-level spells that have the ritual tag from any class’s spell list.

eldritch_invocations.name: Devil's Sight
eldritch_invocations.description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

eldritch_invocations.name: Eldritch Sight
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Detect Magic at will, without expending a spell slot.

eldritch_invocations.name: Eldritch Spear
eldritch_invocations.description: When you cast Eldritch Blast, its range is 300 feet.

eldritch_invocations.name: Eyes of the Rune Keeper
eldritch_invocations.description: You can read all writing.

eldritch_invocations.name: Fiendish Vigor
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast False Life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components.

eldritch_invocations.name: Gaze of Two Minds
eldritch_invocations.description: You can use your action to touch a willing humanoid and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can use your action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, but are blinded and deafened to your own surroundings.

eldritch_invocations.name: Lifedrinker
eldritch_invocations.prerequisite: 12th level, Pact of the Blade feature
eldritch_invocations.description: When you hit a creature with your pact weapon, the creature takes extra necrotic damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).

eldritch_invocations.name: Mask of Many Faces
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Disguise Self at will, without expending a spell slot.

eldritch_invocations.name: Master of Myriad Forms
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Alter Self at will, without expending a spell slot.

eldritch_invocations.name: Mire the Mind
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Slow once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

eldritch_invocations.name: Misty Visions
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Silent Image at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

eldritch_invocations.name: One with Shadows
eldritch_invocations.description: When you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you can use your action to become invisible until you move or take an action or a reaction.

eldritch_invocations.name: Otherworldly Leap
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Jump on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot or material components.

eldritch_invocations.name: Repelling Blast
eldritch_invocations.description: When you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can push the creature up to 10 feet away from you in a straight line.

eldritch_invocations.name: Sculptor of Flesh
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Polymorph once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

eldritch_invocations.name: Sign of Ill Omen
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Bestow Curse once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

eldritch_invocations.name: Thief of Five Fates
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Bane once using a warlock spell slot. You can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

eldritch_invocations.name: Thirsting Blade
eldritch_invocations.prerequisite: 5th level, Pact of the Blade feature
eldritch_invocations.description: You can attack with your pact weapon twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

eldritch_invocations.name: Visions of Distant Realms
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Arcane Eye at will, without expending a spell slot.

eldritch_invocations.name: Voice of the Chain Master
eldritch_invocations.description: You can communicate telepathically with your familiar and perceive through your familiar’s senses as long as you are on the same plane of existence. Additionally, while perceiving through your familiar’s senses, you can also speak through your familiar in your own voice, even if your familiar is normally incapable of speech.

eldritch_invocations.name: Whispers of the Grave
eldritch_invocations.description: You can cast Speak with Dead at will, without expending a spell slot.

eldritch_invocations.name: Witch Sight
eldritch_invocations.description: You can see the true form of any shapechanger or creature concealed by illusion or transmutation magic while the creature is within 30 feet of you and within line of sight.
